name: 化者天狱 Revenant in the Paradise
name_original: 化者天狱 Revenant in the Paradise
description:
The main character, a high school girl, is trapped into a world which is full of monsters
when she was travelling to Tokyo. In this situation, player will not only explore and
solve puzzles to find the chances of living, but also fight with monsters when necessary.
The people you met in this world can be enemies or allies. The word from their mouth
can be true or a lie. The fate of everyone is connected here. Could our main character
eventually grab the Freedom and Life she desired for?
*This game is the continuation of free game "The Left". But they are not tightly related,
thus players who never play "The Left" can start with this game directly.




The main character. She was heading toward Tokyo for some emergency but unluckily
involved with this disasters.


A shy girl who was thrown into this world like the main character，and she seems to
have complicated backstory.


A world-known exorcist, who is responsible of the this case and has strong execution.


A young man who wanders om this world, shows suspicious first impression.


A young scholar who hides in the library of this world, knowledgable but has strange personality






· Slightly-horror RPG，friendly to those who feel uneasy to horror element.
· Long story composed of 9 parts and 4 endings, which needs totally about 5-6 hours to finish，
· Players can solve puzzles and do battle with monsters, no EXP system and thus no need to
spend time repeating killing monsters.
· Besides main story, there is some side quest for player to explore and solve, which provides
many useful items and may affect the final ending.
· Interaction with other characters. Besides main story, player can talk to other characters and
improve relationship, which may determine the final ending.
